Published November 13 2014

The Serial Podcast

The Serial Podcast — (http://kottke.org/14/11/serial) More and more folks are looking forward to Thursdays and the new episode of Serial that comes with it. If you haven’t listened in yet, go start with episode #1. Give it 20 minutes of your weekend, you won’t be disappointed.

Enjoy your day.
